title: ICE arrests illegal Mexican national involved in 2014 vehicular homicide of 13-year-old girl
description: ICE arrested Ramiro Guevara, a 46-year-old Mexican national, who was involved in a 2014 vehicle accident resulting in the death of a 13-year-old girl. He was wanted for an outstanding order of deportation.

title: Father, son arrested on fentanyl trafficking, gun sales and immigration violations following ICE, multiagency investigation
description: A father and son were arrested for trafficking fentanyl and illegal firearms sales. The investigation was conducted by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement assisted by multiple federal and state law enforcement agencies focused on financial crimes in Southern California. One of the arrestees was also charged with illegal reentry of a removed alien.

title: ICE Denver removes man wanted in El Salvador
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Salvadoran national and foreign fugitive Jose Eduardo Moran-Garcia, 28, to El Salvador via air transportation. Moran is wanted in his home country for aggravated homicide, displacement of individuals, unlawful groupings and aggravated robbery.

title: International law enforcement cooperation leads to takedown and immigration arrests of alien smugglers in US and Brazil
description: Extensive coordination between the United States and Brazilian law enforcement led to the arrest of a previously convicted alien smuggler, Flavio Alexandre Alves, in Worcester, MA, and the execution of search warrants and arrests of alleged human smugglers in Brazil. Alves is charged with conspiracy to bring aliens to and transport aliens within the United States for financial gain.

title: Florida sex offender sentenced to 15 years for distribution of child sexual abuse material
description: A Florida man was sentenced to 15 years in federal prison for distributing imagery and video depicting child sexual abuse on a social media application.

title: Multiagency investigation results in Cartel Del Noreste leader sentencing for murder-for-hire, kidnapping conspiracies
description: A Cartel Del Noreste leader was sentenced for his role in a murder-for-hire scheme that brought hitmen across the U.S. border into Laredo. He was found guilty of conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute cocaine, murder-for-hire conspiracy, murder for hire, conspiracy to kidnap, possession of firearms in furtherance of a drug trafficking-related crime and interstate travel in aid of racketeering.

title: ICE Arizona, multiagency case results in Nogales man sentenced to 10 years in prison for methamphetamine possession, intent to distribute
description: A Nogales man was sentenced to 120 months in prison for possession with the intent to distribute methamphetamine, following an investigation by multiple agencies including ICE.

title: ICE Salt Lake City removes foreign fugitive for sexual assault of minor
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Mexican citizen and foreign fugitive Jairo Ivan Paredes Cota, 43, to Mexico via ground transportation. Paredes is wanted in his home country for the sexual assault of a minor.

title: ICE Philadelphia removes illegal alien wanted for murder to Ecuador
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Luis Gerardo Pelaez Llivichuzca, a citizen of Ecuador wanted for murder, to Ecuador.

title: ICE arrests 72 criminal aliens during week-long multi-agency operation in the Rio Grande Valley
description: ICE, with assistance from federal, state and local law enforcement partners, arrested 72 illegal aliens – including 61 criminal aliens and two documented gang members – during a targeted enforcement operation conducted from March 16 to 22 in the Rio Grande Valley area.

title: ICE, law enforcement partners arrest 13 illegal criminal alien offenders during Huntsville enforcement operation
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement along with law enforcement partners apprehended 13 illegal aliens in the Huntsville area during an enhanced, targeted enforcement operation focused on criminal illegal aliens. Eight of the offenders had been previously removed from the United States and have federal convictions for illegal reentry after removal.

title: ICE removes Mexican fugitive wanted for family violence
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Juan Jasso-Botello, a 44-year-old Mexican fugitive wanted in Mexico for family violence.

title: ICE Boston arrests Brazilian alien charged with assault, battery in Massachusetts
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement apprehended an illegally present Brazilian alien charged with assault and battery on a family member when officers arrested Weliton Pires-Dos Santos, 39, in Framingham.

title: ICE Houston removes Guatemalan fugitive wanted for criminal impersonation
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Kevin Estuardo Escobar Chanas, a 27-year-old foreign fugitive wanted for criminal impersonation in Guatemala, from the United States.

title: ICE arrests Chinese national convicted of illegally acting as agent of foreign government
description: ICE apprehended Ming Xi Zhang, a Chinese national convicted of illegally acting as an agent of a foreign government, and detained him in Newark, New Jersey.

title: ICE Boston arrests Lebanese alien charged with assault, battery, sex crime in Massachusetts
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement apprehended Pierre Maurice Al-Asmar, an illegally present Lebanese national charged with assault and battery and indecent assault and battery on person 14 or over.

title: ICE, partners’ rapid response locate suspect at Newark airport attempting to flee the US
description: ICE, assisted by partner law enforcement agencies, apprehended a Hungarian national at Newark Liberty International Airport who was wanted for allegedly raping a child. The suspect was attempting to flee the United States.

title: ICE Newark investigation leads to conviction of Pennsylvania man for conspiring to distribute cocaine
description: A Pennsylvania man was found guilty of conspiring to distribute cocaine following an U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement investigation.

title: ICE arrests Brazilian national convicted of drug trafficking in home country
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement arrested Dirlei Da Luz Da Silva, 35, a citizen of Brazil wanted by Brazilian authorities for failing to appear and serve his sentence for drug trafficking related crimes.

title: ICE San Franciso and partners take transnational criminal off the streets in California
description: ICE arrested Gurdev Singh, an Indian national and criminal alien, as part of a targeted criminal enforcement action.

title: ICE arrests Brazilian national for selling fake Social Security cards and green cards
description: An illegally present Brazilian national was arrested for allegedly selling fraudulent Social Security cards and Legal Permanent Resident cards.

title: Driver of second human smuggling vehicle involved in 2021 Southwest Texas incident sentenced to 10 years in federal prison following ICE Del Rio and federal partner investigation
description: A Salvadoran man was sentenced to 10 years in prison for his role in a deadly 2021 human smuggling operation. He was the driver of the second vehicle involved in the incident where one vehicle crashed, killing eight illegal alien passengers, and the other driver, Barrientos-Quintanilla, was apprehended after a traffic stop and subsequent foot chase.

title: ICE, law enforcement partners arrest 370 alien offenders during enhanced operation in Massachusetts
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and federal law enforcement partners apprehended 370 illegal aliens in Massachusetts during an enhanced targeted enforcement operation focusing on transnational organized crime, gangs, and egregious illegal alien offenders.
